Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player

  • public class Player
extends Object
    An Object representing a player for a game of War

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(String n,
              boolean c)
        Primary Constructor Builds a "Player" object with a provided name. Can be flagged as a "Computer" player depending on provided argument
        Parameters:
        String - Name of Player
        boolean - Is this a Computer Controlled Player?

      • Player

        public Player(String n)
        Alternate Constructor Builds a "Player" object with a provided name. Is flagged as not a "Computer" player.
        Parameters:
        String - Name of Player

    • Method Detail

      • getCard

        public void getCard(WarCard c)
        getCard Method Adds the parameter WarCard to the Player's Deck
        Parameters:
        WarCard - Card to be added to this player's deck

      • play

        public void play()
        play Method Places the Top Card of the Player's deck on the top of the playing field stack.

      • play

        public void play(boolean f)
        play Method - Alternate Accepts a boolean setting Card to face Up if true, face down if false. Then takes top card of Player's deck and places it on top of the playing field stack.
        Parameters:
        boolean - Play this card Face Up?

      • giveSpoils

        public WarCard giveSpoils()
        giveSpoils Method Returns the top card of this Player's field.
        Returns:
        WarCard Top WarCard of this player's field.

      • isFieldEmpty

        public boolean isFieldEmpty()
        isFieldEmpty Method Returns true if the field has no cards in it.
        Returns:
        boolean is the Field Empty?

      • isDeckEmpty

        public boolean isDeckEmpty()
        isDeckEmpty Method Returns true if the deck has no cards in it.
        Returns:
        boolean is the Deck Empty?

      • getState

        public boolean getState()
        getState Method Returns true if the player can still play. (If the deck is not empty)
        Returns:
        boolean Is this player still in the game?

      • peekCurrent

        public WarCard peekCurrent()
        giveSpoils Method Returns a copy of the top card of this Player's field, for comparing.
        Returns:
        WarCard A copy of the Top WarCard of this player's field.

      • getName

        public String getName()
        getName Method Returns this player's name as a String
        Returns:
        String Players Name
